input.label: Device:
input.populatingSearch: | stats count | eval device="All devices" | eval address="*" | inputlookup append=t insteon_devices | search (subcategory=8 category=10) OR device="All devices" | lookup insteon_device_types category subcategory OUTPUT category_name description | eval device=case(address=="*", device, NOT isnull(name), name, NOT isnull(address), address, NOT isnull(device), device) | stats count(device) by device, address

input.label: Room:
input.populatingSearch: | stats count | eval room="*" | eval room_name="All rooms" | inputlookup append=t insteon_devices | eval room_name=if(isnull(room_name),room,room_name) | stats last(room_name) as room_name by room

search.query: sourcetype=insteon_plm subcategory=8 category=10 modem_command_code=50 all_link=1 `get_command_info` | sort -_time | stats first(command) as command first(_time) as last_seen first(subcategory) as subcategory first(category) as category by from | eval address=from | eval status=if(like(command, "%wet%"),1,0) | inputlookup insteon_devices append=t | search subcategory=8 category=10 address="$form.device$" | stats first(status) as status first(last_seen) as last_seen_int last(name) as name last(room) as room by address | fillnull status value="-1" | `timesince(last_seen_int,last_seen)` | eval last_seen=case(now()-last_seen_int > 90000,last_seen."!", isnull(last_seen), "never", 1 = 1, last_seen) | search room="$form.room$" | fields address status name room last_seen
